Package Catalano.Math.Geometry

The Catalano.Math.Geometry namespace contains set of geometry utilities, which are used by other Catalano namespaces or may be used individually.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IShapeOptimizer
    Interface for shape optimizing algorithms.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConvexHullDefects
    Convex Hull Defects Extractor.
    ConvexityDefect
    Convexity defect.
    FlatAnglesOptimizer
    Shape optimizer, which removes obtuse angles (close to flat) from a shape.
    GeometryTools  
    GrahamConvexHull
    Graham scan algorithm for finding convex hull.
    KCurvature
    K-curvatures algorithm for local contour extrema detection.
    Line  

Package Catalano.Math.Geometry Description

The Catalano.Math.Geometry namespace contains set of geometry utilities, which are used by other Catalano namespaces or may be used individually.
